snippet: TANANBAUM--Stanley. We mourn the passing of our beloved Uncle Stanley Tananbaum. Everything he did was done to perfection. Successful in business, a sportsman, a collector of American antiques and a philanthropist. Devoted to his extended family and adoring of his late wife Doris. Our condolences to his children and grand- children. The late Harold, Alan, Minna and David Levine families, and the late Pat and Jerry Epstein 1/3
lead_paragraph: TANANBAUM--Stanley. We mourn the passing of our beloved Uncle Stanley Tananbaum. Everything he did was done to perfection. Successful in business, a sportsman, a collector of American antiques and a philanthropist. Devoted to his extended family and adoring of his late wife Doris. Our condolences to his children and grand- children. The late Harold, Alan, Minna and David Levine families, and the late Pat and Jerry Epstein 1/3
